_source.text: According to Vescuso, Black Duck, which also specializes in FOSS management, describes business as "better than ever," with increased business in the previous quarter of 2008 and a current quarter that looks even stronger.

_source.text: After brief talks by Ban Ki Moon ("We have to seal the deal"), HRH Charles Prince of Wales ("They will not remember us for what we said, but for what we did"), and Danish Prime Minister Rasmussen ("We don't have time for courtesy and protocol... the world is watching... no one can duck and cover... we must simply do better and BE better than ever before"), Hedegaard began with a hefty dose of reality.
